List of Functions¶

runCV.runCV(dataset='first_full', path='/home/logan/Documents/Results/GraphNet/rgn/LOSO', olddir=None, problem=<class 'cwpath.lasso.RobustGraphnetReweight'>)[source]¶

Automates running cross-validation over a grid

lasso.Lasso(data)¶

LASSO problem with one penalty parameter Minimizes

(np.sum((Y - np.dot(X, beta))**2) + l1 *
np.fabs(beta).sum())

as a function of beta.

lasso.LassoArray(data)¶

LASSO problem with one penalty parameter per coefficient.

Minimizes

(np.sum((Y - np.dot(X, beta))**2) / 2 +
np.fabs(beta * l1).sum())

as a function of beta.
